head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KATZ, FLORENCE M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KATZ, FLORENCE M.

block.p: KATZ-Florence M. Beloved wife of Jerome. Cherished mother of Alan (Joyce) and Susan (Seth Truwit). Loving grandmother of Marjorie, Brittany, Alison, Elana, Noah and Jillian. Funeral services will be held at ''The Riverside Memorial Chapel'', at 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue on Sunday, September 3rd at 11:15 AM.

KATZ-Florence M. Beloved wife of Jerome. Cherished mother of Alan (Joyce) and Susan (Seth Truwit). Loving grandmother of Marjorie, Brittany, Alison, Elana, Noah and Jillian. Funeral services will be held at ''The Riverside Memorial Chapel'', at 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue on Sunday, September 3rd at 11:15 AM.
